name: Morrowind Key Mapper
body:
# Morrowind Key Mapper

Morrowind Key Mapper is a DInput wrapper that remaps key codes to enable the use of non-US keyboards in [Morrowind](www.elderscrolls.com/morrowind/).

## Details

See the README on Git Hub for more details. [link](github.com/cordarei/morrowind_keymap)

## Installing

Currently, if you want to use the Morrowind Key Mapper you need to download the code, build the Visual Studio projects, and copy the DLLs into your Morrowind folder under Program Files.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
